input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is IBMTSMActor

The execute macro command executes a series of commands that you specify in a macro file. By including the macro command within a macro file, you can nest as many as ten levels of commands. Specify different commands in different line.
Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <operation-name>execute-macro</operation-name> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> <command-arguments> <macroname>C:\macro.txt</macroname> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
Command Arguments Description:
macroname[Required] Specifies the fully qualified name of the file containing the commands.

documentation.description: This wrapper executes a series of commands that you specify in a macro file. By including the macro command within a macro file, you can nest as many as ten levels of commands. Specify different commands in different line.
